title: Apogee ACS-3 Professional speaker
item_description:
Apogee ACS-3 Professional speaker

  • Apogee ACS-3 high powered 10in two-way speaker with fly bracket
  • ENCLOSURE TYPE: 20 degree trapezoidal
  • FORMAT: Mono-amp, two-way. Controller optional
  • DRIVER COMPLEMENT:
    • Low Frequency Apogee 6" (152mm) permanent magnet cone type driver
    • High Frequency Apogee 1" (25mm) phenolic dome
    • Nominal Impedance 8 ohms
  • SENSITIVITY: 89.5 dB SPL / 130 Hz - 15 kHz, 1 watt @ 1 meter
  • FREQUENCY RESPONSE: 130 Hz - 15 kHz ± 3 dB, 1m on axis
  • SOUND PRESSURE LEVEL: 108 dB continuous, 114 dB peak @ 1m
  • MAX POWER HANDLING: 100 watts continuous, 400 watts peak
  • DISPERSION
    • Horizontal — 75 degrees
    • Vertical — 60 degrees
  • INPUT CONNECTORS: 5-way Binding Posts
  • CABINET CONSTRUCTION: Multi-ply Baltic birch
  • GRILL: Coated perforated metal
  • RIGGING HARDWARE: 4 internal 16 gauge steel backing plates. Accepts 1/4" - 20 thread. 4 pick points total
  • COLOR: Black - other colors optional
  • FINISH: Textur: 13.6" (346 mm) high by 7.5" (191 mm) wide (front) by 4.9" (126 mm) high (rear) by 7.4" (187 mm) deep
  • WEIGHT: 12.5 lbs. (5.7 kg)
